attributes.action: abolish VAT on chocolate, chocolate biscuits, fruit juice or other foodstuffs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1) It is ridiculous that a chocolate digestive incurs VAT but a Jaffa cake does not.  The VAT on 'luxury items' should not extend to food items, such as chocolate biscuits, or orange juice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
